C D F G I N P U 

C

com.amitinside.featureflags - package com.amitinside.featureflags
Provides API for managing feature instances Bundles wishing to use this package must list the package in the Import-Package header of the bundle's manifest.
com.amitinside.featureflags.dto - package com.amitinside.featureflags.dto
Provides data transfer objects for feature flags instances Bundles wishing to use this package must list the package in the Import-Package header of the bundle's manifest.
ConfigurationDTO - Class in com.amitinside.featureflags.dto
Data Transfer Object for a configuration comprising features.
ConfigurationDTO() - Constructor for class com.amitinside.featureflags.dto.ConfigurationDTO
 

D

description - Variable in class com.amitinside.featureflags.dto.FeatureDTO
The description of the feature

F

FEATURE_ID_PREFIX - Static variable in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureManager
The prefix of the feature identifier pattern.
FeatureDTO - Class in com.amitinside.featureflags.dto
Data Transfer Object for a feature.
FeatureDTO() - Constructor for class com.amitinside.featureflags.dto.FeatureDTO
 
FeatureManager - Interface in com.amitinside.featureflags
The FeatureManager service is the application access point to the feature flags functionality.
features - Variable in class com.amitinside.featureflags.dto.ConfigurationDTO
The associated features

G

getConfiguration(String) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureManager
Returns the known ConfigurationDTO instance ConfigurationDTO instances are known if they comprise features
getConfigurations() - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureManager
Retrieve all (known) ConfigurationDTO instances ConfigurationDTOs are known if they comprise features
getFeature(String, String) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureManager
Returns the feature registered under the specified configuration PID with the given name FeatureDTO instances are known if they are registered with OSGi configuration.
getFeatures(String) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureManager
Retrieve all (known) FeatureDTO instances registered under the provided configuration PID FeatureDTOs are known if they are configured with OSGi configuration under the specified configuration PID

I

id - Variable in class com.amitinside.featureflags.dto.FeatureDTO
The identifier of the feature.
isEnabled - Variable in class com.amitinside.featureflags.dto.FeatureDTO
The enablement flag of the feature that denotes whether the feature is enabled or not

N

name - Variable in class com.amitinside.featureflags.dto.FeatureDTO
The name of the feature

P

pid - Variable in class com.amitinside.featureflags.dto.ConfigurationDTO
The configuration PID in which the associated features are specified
properties - Variable in class com.amitinside.featureflags.dto.FeatureDTO
The extra properties to categorize the feature

U

updateFeature(String, String, boolean) - Method in interface com.amitinside.featureflags.FeatureManager
Updates the specified feature registered under the specified configuration PID
